name: Fire
description: Destructive flames and intense heat - strong offense, weak to water
lore: Fire represents passion, destruction, and raw power. Masters of fire can incinerate enemies but struggle against water and ice.

volcanic.description: Fire types thrive in volcanic heat, taking reduced damage

desert.description: Fire types are strengthened in hot, dry environments

abilityTypeBonus.description: Fire type users gain 20% bonus damage with fire abilities

freeze.description: Fire types are more susceptible to freezing
